Package arkanoid

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball  
    BallRemover  
    BaseIndicator
    The base class of an indicator (with counter).
    Block  
    BlockRemover
    A BlockRemover is in charge of removing blocks from the game, as well as keeping count of the number of blocks that were removed.
    ColorChanger  
    CountdownAnimation
    A class for the countdown animation.
    GameEnvironment
    Collection of collidables of a game.
    GameFlow  
    GameLevel
    Game class.
    Indicator
    A class of the bar above the screen.
    LevelNameDisplayer
    A Sprite that displays the name of the current level.
    LivesIndicator
    A sprite that follows the lives of the user.
    Paddle  
    PauseScreen
    Pause Screen.
    ScoreIndicator
    A Sprite that follows the score of the game.
    ScoreTrackingListener
    A listener that keeps track of the score.
    SpriteCollection
    A collection of sprites.
    Wall
    A class that represents a wall in the game.
